name: Deleaf | Brock CSC Game Jam 2023
description:
Submission for the Brock CSC Game Jam 2023 with the theme 'Hidden World'.

You play as a ghost who cannot see or pass through walls. Use your ghost senses to find a way through the hidden obstacles, collect all the leaves and get to the door.

Controls:

WASD/ARROWS - move up, left, down, right

R - restart

Q - quit

Created in 14 hours so there will be bugs. 😎

All music, sound effects, and sprites are created by me. 

Sprite inspiration from Baba Is You.
